name: ST4R's Intrepid Galaxy Flight!! [JAM DEMO VER]
name_original: ST4R's Intrepid Galaxy Flight!! [JAM DEMO VER]
description:
ST4R has crash-landed in a strange little planet, and they need your assistance! Follow their journey in colorful landscapes, meeting even more colorful new friends, as you collect the four lost shards of their spaceship's core and repair it!

ST4R's Intrepid Galaxy Flight!! is a story-focused adventure game built in RPG Maker MZ, with a focus on character interactions and minor puzzle elements. (That means not to expect any combat in this!)
This demo was created in under a month for the "Touch the Stars" Game Jam and should serve only as an example of what the finished game would look like.

Estimated playtime: 30mins
Available languages: English

Graphics by Four★Zero and Gotcha Gotcha Games (via RPG Maker's RTP)
Galaxy/Planet Graphics via Deep-Fold's space and planet generators
Music by Aaron Krogh and Yadu Rajiv
Sound Effects by David Stearns and Beep Yeah!
Plugins by Caethryl, Casper Gaming, Coelocanth, Galv, Hudell, Moghunter, Team VisuStella
